transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Executive: Ji
Han ji good morning Shiv ji kaise ho aap Anil ji sorry
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai sir
Executive: Han ji aapka kal call aaya tha na mere pass ki aapke pass leads vagera nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: Ji
Executive: Han ji sir to kaise leads nahi aa rahi matlab jin product me aap deal karte ho uski leads nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: Are kuch nahi hai sir company kama ke apna baith liya sabse paisa de liya logo ko lead aave sir mat de
Samasya waha kuch samajh pa rahe aap kahan se
Executive: Sir aisa hota to sir main aapko servicing pe call thodi na kar raha tha ki aapko issue aa raha hai main aapke pass leads deta hu aapka email bhara hua hai
Customer: Koi aadmi aadmi koi usme dhoondhega tab na milega usko
Koi dhoondhne wala nahi hai to kahan se dalega apna paida karega kahan wahi kharedega India mart wala apne kahan
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi aap but jo bol rahe ho ki leads nahi aa rahi hai uska mere ko bataye sir
Customer: To kahan aapko nahi dikhai de raha waha par sab kholiye to usme nahi pata chalega inko aa raha hai ki nahi aa raha hai ye
Sir yaha pe to show kar rahi hai humko puch rahe hai wo aapko aapko kya show kar raha hai
Customer: Yaha pe to lead show kar rahi hai
Executive: Tobacco cutting machine ki leads hai
Customer: Ha to kitna hamare pass aaya hua hai
Executive: Han ji
Customer: Hamare pass aaya hua hai isme lead
Executive: Kya matlab aawaz aapka saaf nahi aa rahi kya keh rahe ho
Customer: Are kal ke hamare pass aaya hua hai lead
Executive: Kya pass aaya hua hai matlab main samajh nahi raha aap kya to kya kehna chah rahe ho
Customer: Aap aam jo hai aam aap log bechte hain kya bechte hain
Executive: Are leade na bechte hain ji
Customer: Han ji
Executive: Ha to leade ke baat karenge aur kya ke baat karenge
Customer: Hamare pass kahan aaya hua hai lead bata rahe hai ki abhi aaya hua hai
Executive: Aap ek bar mere sath video meet pe aao main aapko leads dikhata hu yaha pe jo bhi mere yaha pe aa rakhi hai aise maine abhi aisa to hai nahi ki maine aapko call kara aur maine yaha pe leads generate kar di ho ye yaha pe 15 minute pehle ki lead hai ek ghante pehle ki lead hai kal ki lead hai teen din pehle ki lead hai leads to sari generate ho hi rahi hai main aapko jo leads lapse ho gayi hai wo bhi dikha dunga
Main aap do minute ha main aapko ek bar link share kar raha hu ek bar link join karna main aapko dikhata hu
Customer: Abhi kam kar rahe hai to kahan se link join kar lenge aapka bataye hum
Executive: Theek hai but meri aapse pehle bhi baat hui thi ek hafte pehle maine aapko tab bhi to bataya tha ki leads aapke pass aa rahi hai aap consume nahi kar rahe ho
Customer: Sab kar rahe hai
Executive: Inquiry inquiry vagera aapke pass kam aa rahi hai abhi shayad se calls aap direct calls bol rahe ho uske liye bol rahe ho aap kya ki wo nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: Direct call ka waha par jo batata hai usi ko na fir message vagera kar karke call karke puchte hain
Executive: Hmm ek to dekho aapka by leads wala hota hai jab jo aap lead consume karte ho ek aapke pass jo direct calls aati hai calls aapke pass nahi aayi hai pichle ek hafte mein wo cheez main dekh raha hu yaha pe
Calls ka thoda hua hai aapke pass inflow kam but uske alava aise nahi hai ki by leads generate nahi ho rahi aapki profile mein agar aap leads check karni aati hai aapko
Customer: Sir to jaise kar rahe hai usi ko hum wahi bataya jaise kar rahe hain
Executive: Ek bar check karna matlab by leads mein ja ke aap batao mere ko aapke profile pe lead show kar rahi hai ya nahi kar rahi hai kyuki yaha se maine check kara yaha pe to show kar rahi hai sir
Customer: Are to aapko dikhaun sir dikhai de raha hai upar mein wo abhi jo aaya hai ek ghanta pehle vaisali bihar wala
Executive: Haan manual tobacco cutting machine ki uske niche dekho aur niche aur ek aur bhi to aa rakhi hai Gorakhpur Uttar Pradesh ki 15 minute pehle ki
Customer: Ha ye abhi aaya hai ek to
Executive: Han ji uske aur niche dekho ek aur ek ghante pehle ki aa rakhi hai tobacco cutting 60 cm machine
Customer: Baki isse pehle jo abhi hum khole uska bhi to aapko dikhai raha hoga ki isse pehle hum khol karke dekhe to uske hisab se
Executive: Wo kabhi kabaar hota hai aise dekho kabhi aisa hota hai na ki jaise jitni leads generate hui wo kisi ne consume kar li man lo ab us point pe agar aap lead nahi hai to wo tab show karta hai but aise nahi hai aapke product line mein bahut leads generate hoti hai sir aur agar aapko main total batau na ki aap isme machines vagera me jaise deal karte ho to sabse jyada leads to main aapko batata hu kiski generate hoti hai aapki profile aapki lead
Customer: Upar upar jo dekh rahe hai vaisali bihar wala ye to khair hum banate hi nahi machine wala
Executive: Kaun sa wala jo tobacco cutting machine hai
Customer: Ha naam bhale teen diya hai na magar iska machine thodi hum dalenge
Executive: Wo jo niche photo aa rahi hai wo lead nahi hai sir wo uska matlab ye hota hai ki jo buyer hai usne wala product bhi dekha hai
Customer: Iska matlab usko bhi log bech sakte hain
Executive: Nahi nahi wo bas wo hota hai jaise aap kabhi amazon vagera pe kuch kharidte ho ya fir online kuch kharidte ho to side mein suggestions nahi aate ki ye bhi dekh sakte ho aap to bas wo hota hai ki buyer ne bas ye bhi dekha hai iska matlab ye nahi ki lead is cheez ki aa rakhi hai aapke pass
Customer: Nahi nahi wo to buyer to wahi dekh kar ke aaya hai bas usko sab apply log kar diya kaise ye wo aa gaya chaliye isme usko aa gaya
Executive: Jaruri nahi hai sir wo to matlab isme thoda niche hmm
Customer: Swasth hai ki bimar hai iska thoda dekhne ja raha hai
Executive: Han ji matlab samajh raha hu main aapki baat ko bhi but jaruri nahi hota aisa baki agar aapko kabhi aisa lagta hai ki aapke pass jo lead aayi hai wo aap us category mein deal nahi karte ho to side mein na option hota hai not element mark karne ka aap waha se usko not element bhi mark kar sakte ho to aapke pass hmm ab mere ko ek cheez batao aap bas isi mein deal nahi karte ho ye jo aapka manual matlab tobacco cutting machine hai isi mein hi aap deal karte ho
Customer: Ha to sabka apna apna banane wala na hai koi kuch bana raha hai koi kuch bana raha hai
Executive: Jaise aapke product line mein na ye fiber laser cutting machine ki sabse jyada leads generate hoti hai matlab 3000 ke approx approx but iska lead aap kafi kam consume karte ho
Customer: Fiber mein alag category hai sir
Executive: Han ji fiber laser cutting machine hum cutting wala ka cutting wala ka deal karte hain to bhej deta hai usme kya hai ki kaun sa dusra dusra jo aaya usi ko sab us category ka rahega kuch fiber likha hua rahega bas structure wala structure ka kam thodi fiber structure mein uska aa jata hai
Customer: Fiber structure mein
Executive: Theek hai baki dekho leads to aa rahi hai maine aapke matlab product mein bhi check kara dusre product mein bhi
Customer: Do teen machine mein dikkat hai na udhar hmm abhi aa nahi raha hai to theek hai magar abhi do teen machine mein dikkat chal raha hai
Executive: Nahi nahi wo ab dekho kabhi kabaar aise hota hai ki matlab jab lead khatam ho gayi ya fir generate nahi hui tab show nahi hoti aisa warna to sir aapke product line mein kafi lead generate hoti hai matlab saal ki agar 3000 lead ek product ki aapki generate ho rahi hai total total main aapko batata hu dekho total aapke panch che products hai na jo usme saal bhar ki jo hai 5660 leads total generate hoti hai panch category mein aap deal karte ho na fiber cutting pillow cutting machine banana fiber extractor tobacco cutting machine aur ye final laser cutting machine to 6000 ke something lead generate ho rahi hai aapki to agar din ki aap teen se char lead bhi consume karoge ek mahine ki agar aap 90 lead consume kar rahe ho to matlab aapka easily agar teen char leads bhi aapki convert hoti hai to aapko aaram se business mil jayega samajh rahe ho aap meri baat aur saal bhar mein to aapko matlab bahut business mil jayega to lead generate ho rahi hai sir bas aap thoda active raho aur jo aata hai usko idhar band ho gaya to idhar rahega Diwali ke baad thoda sa dikkat hua hai
Customer: Thoda sa dikkat hua hai
Executive: Achcha kabhi kabaar aise hota hai ki jaise jaise lead aapke pass show nahi kar rahi na aap upar se search bhi kar sakte ho by leads mein upar search ka option aata hai na waha pe ja ke aap search karke bhi kisi aur product ki leads bhi dekh sakte ho baki mere ko ye batao free kab ho gaya main aapko video call mein bata dunga kaise kaise kya kya karna hai
Customer: Theek hai sir hum call karenge fir aapko
Executive: Aaj free nahi ho aap matlab abhi ho jaye thodi der mein ya fir kyuki aapka actually ticket bhi open ho rakha hai is cheez ke regarding leads nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: Ji ha kal customer care se baat kar rahe the kya
Executive: Han ji han ji to leads to dekho aa rahi hai to usko main close kar du baki main aapko video call mein ek bar bata dunga sab kuch theek hai aap mere ko call kar dena aaj ya kal mein baki ek aur cheez mere ko aapko batani thi jo aapka lead manager hota hai na waha pe bhi aake check kara karo leads vagera ko jo direct inquiries aati hai aapke pass wo lead manager mein show hoti hai to lead manager mein ja ke check kara karo ki message vagera to nahi aaye ya fir aapko kisi se baat karni thi aapke dimag se to nahi nikal gaya to wo sab cheeze lead manager mein rehti hai
Customer: To kahan hai sir
Executive: Han ji aur thoda rating and reviews ke liye bhi bola karo sir clients ko aapka matlab achcha chal raha hai profile ka rating kafi to isko aur upar karo sir 4.1 chal raha hai jaise abhi to kisi client vagera se deal hota hai na to usko bola karo ask for review ka option aata hai aapke pass lead manager mein waha se han ji waha se review liya karo baki mere ko ek bar bata dena message karke ya fir call karke aap free kab ho to main aapko us time pe connect kar lunga theek hai baki sir aapke pass na feedback ka wo aayega ki hamari baat hui ya fir nahi hui to usme ek bar mail pe aayega us pe ek bar yes kar dena theek hai baki ek bar main thodi der mein aapko dobara connect kar lunga 12 ek baje tak theek hai okay sir all right
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states not receiving buyleads.

- States company is earning and not providing leads.

- Mentions issues with 2-3 machines.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed leads are generating.

- Executive offered to show leads via video call.

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant leads.

- Executive explained benefits of lead manager.

- Executive advised to ask clients for reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will reconnect around 12-1 PM.

- Customer to confirm availability for video call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, product, rating, review
